message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present you with an opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, we believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection or business. Considering its intrinsic value and the benefits it offers, we are offering it to you at a special introductory price of $12000. This is a limited-time offer, so I encourage you to consider this proposal carefully. If you have any questions or need more information, please let me know. We look forward to the possibility of working with you.
